text: I'm afraid we can't take yours into account at all. It's a rule of I.I.I. You see, you how utterly extraordinary, said Serena angrily,"you must be living in the nineteenth century."Oh, but it's a very general rule, Mrs. Buttery,you'll find that no insurance companies, or building societies, for that matter, will allow for the wife's earnings.
handwritten_text: I'm afraid we can't take yours into account at all. It's a rule of I.I.I. You see, you how utterly extraordinary, said Serena angrily,"you must be living in the nineteenth century."Oh, but it's a very general rule, Mrs. Buttery,you'll find that no insurance companies, or building societies, for that matter, will allow for the wife's earnings.
